attributes.action: pull his finger out and sort out the economy or resign, along with Mr A Darling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I like a lot of people find it strange that in good times the government claim it is due to their management of the economy, and yet when there is a downturn it is everyone elses fault bar theirs.

They should take the banks and energy companies to task over their mis-management. If these were ordinary companies they would have gone to the wall. I believe the government have a legitimate cause to do this as they are taking tax payers money - therefore they ARE answerable to us.

They should clear up the mess they have help worsen in the housing market by confirming the stamp duty plans.

This government needs to stop twiddling their thumbs and come up with a step by step plan and quickly to get the economy back on it's feet.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
